trustfund: TF028297-IDF TANZANIA REVENUE AUTHORITY ESTABLISHMENT,TF037160-TANZANIA - TAX ADMINISTRATION PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Tax Administration Project of
            Tanzania had the following ratings: outcomes were
            satisfactory, risk to development outcome was low or
            negligible, Bank performance was satisfactory, and borrower
            performance was satisfactory. The lessons learned included:
            1) Where necessary, adjustments in implementation
            arrangements can be very valuable, especially if carried out
            earlier on during the life of the project; 2) Enhancing
            counterpart and country ownership creates incentives for
            commitment to implementation; and 3) Harmonized donor
            approach is a more efficient and effective way of providing
            assistance to the Government.
